document.full_text: dai-ichi life insurance  will book a 100 billion yen ($1.2 billion) special loss for the business year ended march 31 after its stake in tokyo electric power  plummeted in value, a source told reuters.
document.title: dai-ichi life eyes y100 bln loss on tepco shares: source
lines_and_colors: dai-ichi life insurance  will book a 100 billion yen ($1.2 billion) special loss for the business year ended march 31 after its stake in tokyo electric power  plummeted in value, a source told reuters.
